results.definition: a narrow edge of land (usually unpaved) along the side of a road
examples: the car pulled off onto the shoulder

results.definition: a ball-and-socket joint between the head of the humerus and a cavity of the scapula
a cut of meat including the upper joint of the foreleg
carry a burden, either real or metaphoric

examples: He shouldered his way into the crowd

results.definition: the part of a garment that covers or fits over the shoulder
examples: an ornamental gold braid on the shoulder of his uniform

results.definition: the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm
